sys_script.name: Register User

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_3822165f47c3511016869128436d435f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_849361_bookscart_userregistraction</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Register User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var userName = current.user_name.toUpperCase();
	var pwd = current.password.toString();
	var flag = 0;

	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_849361_bookscart_registered_users');
	gr.addQuery('user_name',userName);
	gr.query();
	
	if(gr.next()){
		gs.addErrorMessage('Username Already Exist, Choose different username');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}else{
		gr.initialize();
		gr.user_name = userName;
		gr.password = pwd;
		gr.insert();
		flag = 1;
	}

	if(flag==1){
		gs.addInfoMessage('User Created Successfully...');
		top.window.location = 'x_849361_bookscart_userregistraction.do?sys_id=-1';
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-14 08:09:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3822165f47c3511016869128436d435f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Register User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BooksCart" source="x_849361_bookscart">da6ab4474703111016869128436d43e4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BooksCart">da6ab4474703111016869128436d43e4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3822165f47c3511016869128436d435f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-14 08:09:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3822165f47c3511016869128436d435f"/></record_update>
